name: JavaScript Library Generator
description: A Twitter bot built in Node.js that comes up with imaginary JavaScript libraries.

name: Patchs littéraires
description: A Twitter bot that "improves" literary classics with video game patch notes. Built using Cheap Bots, Done Quick! Tweets in French.

name: Facho bot
description: A Twitter bot built in Node.js that replies with nonsensical racist slur to random press articles. Tweets in French.

name: In search of the ideal icon system
description: A presentation about best practices for using icons on the web.

name: The future of CSS
description: A presentation about the new and upcoming CSS specifications.

name: Français MOFO
description: A Twitter bot built in Node.js that looks for English words used in a French sentence and suggests appropriate translations. Tweets in French.

name: An introduction to design systems
description: A presentation about design systems, style guides and pattern libraries.

name: The Guardian 1959
description: An experiment with CSS grid layout. Read today's news from The Guardian, in its original(ish) 1959 layout.

name: Historical snaps
description: What if Snapchat came out in 1881 ? A Vue.js app with vintage filters using tracking.js for facial recognition.

name: The price of things
description: A Twitter bot built in Node.js that compares the price of random things.
